Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: Gen AI can check everything and give me detailed written feedback everytime. this is not feasible or expected for my teacher to do, they're feedback is normally verbal. Gen AI, however cannot process it like a human would and doesn't know exactly how the markers will mark the work, but a teacher generally will

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: teacher feed back is much more personalised because they have seen all my other work, so made me feel more confident and like I understood what to do.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: i feel more confident that Gen AI has given me all details and caught every error, but I feel like a teacher can usually give a better perspective on what you are doing
